salute.title: Mario Here!
salute.subtitle: Full Stack Developer who enjoys solving problems! ❤️

about.DESCRIPTION_JOB: I am currently at SearchIT creating and maintaining web applications for different clients in collaboration with this company.
about.MY_WORKING: I like to create captivating and visually impactful applications using development tools such as React, Astro, Java, JSP, Figma, ... achieving attractive and functional applications.
about.cita: “I consider myself someone who achieves what he sets out to do, since I believe that achievements are the results of the decisions that are made“
